betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Pipes and their upgrades are how you move items around in the majority of modded minecraft. These are the most primitive within Tobytech.

Wooden Pipes are used to extract items from inventories but need to be powered by a redstone engine (which in turn needs a redstone signal), some machines require you to pull from certain sides of them.

Cobblestone pipes are your transport pipes, they move items from point A to B, some machines will only accept from certain sides.

Iron pipes only allow 1 output and many filled input sides and can be adjusted with a builcraft wrench.

Diamond pipes are color coordinated filter pipes.

Gold pipes speed up items passed through them.

Fluid Pipes act like item pipes but, as you might guess, with liquids.
